column.name: oracle.ide.audit.severity
column.label: Severity
column.description: Severity of issue, or severity of worst contained issue

category.name: oracle.jdeveloper.java.serialization
category.label: Serialization
category.description: Rules which verify proper usage of serialization.

category.name: oracle.jdeveloper.java.javadoc
category.label: Javadoc Comments
category.description: Rules that verify completeness and correctness of Javadoc comments.

category.name: oracle.jdeveloper.java.unused
category.label: Usages
category.description: Rules which report unused declarations, references to deprecated declarations, and unnecesary code.

category.name: oracle.ide.xml.xdf
category.label: XML Dependency Checking
category.description: Checks for unused references in XML file

category.name: oracle.adf.faces.accessibility
category.label: Accessibility
category.description: Checks usage of ADF Faces components to verify that they meet basic accessibility requirements.

rule.name: oracle.jdeveloper.java.serialversionuid-stale
rule.label: Serialization Compatibility Changed
rule.description: JDeveloper will attempt to detect changes that may affect serialization compatibility with older versions of a serializable class. A warning will be issued if such a change is detected. The change detection algorithm is sensitive to changes with respect to fields, implemented interfaces, and superclasses.

rule.name: oracle.jdeveloper.java.tag-is-misplaced
rule.label: Misplaced Tag
rule.description: Tags can only be used on specific types of elements. For example, the @author tag can be used on classes but not on fields or methods. This rule indicates when a tag is used incorrectly.

rule.name: oracle.jdeveloper.java.unused-parameter
rule.label: Unused Parameter
rule.description: Unused parameters add unnecessary complexity and overhead to clients and should be removed if possible. Removal may not be possible if the method implements a superclass or interface method which cannot be modified.

rule.name: oracle.jdeveloper.java.tag-is-missing
rule.label: Missing Required Tags
rule.description: Identifies missing required tags. Required tags are defined in Preferences in the Javadoc section under Code Editor.

rule.name: oracle.ide.xml.brokenref-warning
rule.label: Reference Not Found Warning
rule.description: The referenced object has not been found.

rule.name: oracle.adf.faces.compreqshortdesc
rule.label: Verify that the component has a short description.
rule.description: The 'shortDesc' attribute should be set and non-empty.

violation.message: Code change that may affect serialization compatibility detected in class 'Star'
The 'shortDesc' attribute should be set and non-empty.
